welcome_message_body: Welcome to Council Bluffs, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Explore our historic sites, beautiful parks, and vibrant downtown area, and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eppley Airfield Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Eppley Airfield Airport primarily serves low-cost carriers and offers a more streamlined travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Simón Bolívar International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Simón Bolívar International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
